TopicTitle: Split from Moving on to new and better things… (but not far)

Articles.Content: Some time ago I asked for my account to be cancelled. It appears that my forum membership is still active. could the mods kindly remove all my membership, accounts, etc.?

@benzman, your post has been moved to a more appropriate location.  
 

We cannot do this for you.   IIRC we provided you with a link you needed to fill out.     I do not have it handy right now, but I’ll link it again later.   

Here is the link: https://privacyportal-cdn.onetrust.com/dsarwebform/3efb95b4-aed7-4aa8-85d8-488eb074fa8c/696c1409-ef27-4bca-b988-79b966eaeee0.html

20 hours ago, benzman said:

Some time ago I asked for my account to be cancelled. It appears that my forum membership is still active. could the mods kindly remove all my membership, accounts, etc.?

We hope to meet you again sometime in the future

Safe travels!
